content: a gift from jonathan to all our tiktok cardigan fans i am so impressed and incredibly humbled by this trend and everyone knitting the cardigan i really wanted to show our appreciation so we are sharing the pattern with everyone keep it up x jonathan pattern compiled by ruth herring one size flat body width 84cm total length 60cm sleeve length 48cm gauge 18 sts measures 14cm using 8 00mm needles and super chunky yarn materials super chunky weight yarn for the squares quantities based on 90m length per 100g 4 x 100g balls red 4 x 100g balls black 3 x 100g balls burnt orange 3 x 100g balls yellow 3 x 100g balls green 1 x 100g ball blue aran weight yarn for the cuffs collar and ribbing 3 x 100g balls red 6 x 2cm black buttons a pair of 8 00mm knitting needles for the patchwork a pair of 5 50mm knitting needles for the button and buttonhole bands a pair of 4 00mm knitting needles for the ribs a set of chunky knitter s pins and a knitter s needle for sewing seams =https //web archive org/web/20201231015730/https //www jwanderson com/gb/cardigan-pattern
